summary: One morning, Lily and Ben wake up side by side in bodies that are not theirs. And Magalie, a little girl in the body of a tall, bearded, awaits them in the guest room. This is the beginning... See full summary »
cast: Raphaël Descraques|Julien Josselin|Vincent Tirel|Quentin Bouissou|Pv Nova|Raphaël Carlier|Yoni Dahan|Éléonore Costes|Thomas Vandenberghe|William Pelletier|Sabine Perraud|Justine Le Pottier|Baptiste Lecaplain|Adrien Ménielle|Slimane-Baptiste Berhoun|Kyan Khojandi|Bruno Muschio|David Marsais|Grégoire Ludig|Benoît Blanc|Yacine Belhousse|Florent Bernard|Nicolas Berno|Vanessa Brias|Stefan Carlod|David Coscas|Antoine Daniel|Alice David|François Descraques|Florent Dorin|Sébastien Dédominicis|Benjamin Hekimian|Jimmy Labeeu|Marsu Lacroix|Lucien Maine|Axel Maliverney|Clément Marouzé|Mathieu Sommet|Valentin Vincent
title: Les dissociés
